Module treasurehunt.main
Package client.view.multiscene.controller

Class InGameController

java.lang.Object
client.view.multiscene.controller.InGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientHolder, Stageable, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class InGameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stageable, ClientHolder, javafx.fxml.Initializable
The controller for in-game.fxml This class handles all the graphics in the game screen and sends client requests

    • mouseMoved

      void mouseMoved​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Calculates the the upper left vertice of the help zone rectangle and redraws.
      For more efficency it redraws if the iBoxChosen or jBoxChosen have changed.

    • mousePressed

      void mousePressed​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Calculates iBoxChosen and jBoxChosen and sends the revealMap request to server.
